snippet: Michael Schumacher's family have launched an initiative to help others inspired by the seven-times Formula One world champion's career and character to 'keep fighting' in the face of adversity....
lead_paragraph: Michael Schumacher's family have launched an initiative to help others inspired by the seven-times Formula One world champion's career and character to 'keep fighting' in the face of adversity.

headline.main: 'Keep Fighting' Is New Schumacher Family Initiative
headline.print_headline: 'Keep Fighting' Is New Schumacher Family Initiative
